description:
Whether you are a teacher, artist, or band member this course will show you how to build an audience of raving fans and how to keep them engaged.

During this course you learn how to create an irresistible brand, tackle social media and the world wide web. This course will give you the tools you need to develop your music career into one that is sustainable â€“ that means no more day-time jobs!

The course includes over 20 lecture style videos, four interactive quizzes to test your knowledge and over a dozen pages of take-home tips sheets.

During this course, we'll be covering four main topics:

  1. Business fundamentals
  2. Branding
  3. Promoting
  4. Financing

Each topic includes workouts, so that you can start applying what you've learned.

So, even if you've never taken a business course, you'll be able to use the tricks and tips found in this program to make the most of your career as a musician. This course is designed for artists and bands, but is highly useful for music teachers and entrepreneurs of all stripes. See you in class!
title: A Complete Guide to Business for Musicians
